attributes.action: Cancel trident and spend the money saved making peace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cancel trident and spend the saving making peace in the world.  Only people with courage can take the risk to get rid of trident - let's show the world what really matters for everyone - peace.  Let us show the world that we are prepared to take the risk and make the world a better place.
